alert.note: Alert for Archer; Clay (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 10 at 11:15PM CDT until August 11 at 12:00AM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Clay County in northern Texas... Northeastern Archer County in northern Texas... * Until midnight CDT. * At 1114 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 4 miles northwest of Lake Arrowhead, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Henrietta, Scotland, Jolly, Lake Arrowhead, and Bluegrove. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
